name: John Wright
text:
--They don't like wearing masks here... or being professional---

During COVID-19 the manager had an issue with canceling our to-go order because …More

name: Amara Clevenger
text: Average pizza. The crust is what makes hungry Howies any good. But this place forgets the crush every. Single. Time.

name: Tim Gerow
text: They took the order wrong then when the pizza arrived it was squashed burnt and completely wrong . Called and they refused to fix it. Called the one On abbot road they fixed it and took care of everything Paul thank you family appreciates people like you

name: James Dean
text: Ordered online, waited for 15 minutes after my order was done while an employee rudely acting like they havent seen me trying to catch up because they messed up. Another employee also told them not to answer calls until they caught up. Ridiculous

name: Robbin Carter
text: Huge shout out to George and his team for matching my donation and helping me feed our frontline workers at sparrow. Your you match we were able to feed 3 different units!! Thank you all so much!! You will be highly recommended by me Always!!

name: Chad B.
text: Like their pizza. Some times their wings. Yet i do not suggest the hot wings with sriracha hot sauce it is just with soaked and drowned in the sauce you dont even tast wings anymore. Too messy too excessive i felt like next time just give me straw and a bottle might as well

name: Jess H
text: We love getting pizza here! We actually drive out of our way to pizza from the Harrison location. The staff is always friendly and helpful. In 17 years, we have never had a problem. From dorms to apartments to picking up, they've done a fantastic job!

name: Shane McCarthy
text: I've ordered here many times. This place does NOT care about your order. Everything is an express assembly line to pump out pizzas as fast as possible. Every time is asked for a pizza I've ordered it well done in the options. I also even …More

name: Mike Barger
text: I ordered a pizza and their cheesy bread.  One of them was Triple cheese and pepperoni, and the cheesy bread was just the cheese bread with all of the cheeses.  The mess began with my delivery driver.  She was insanely late to start with, …More

name: Grass Tastes Bad
text: Placed my order at 11:01pm on a Saturday night. Google and Grubhub say they're open and expected delivery is 12am. Well it's 12:27am now and I still don't have my order. I've tried to call the store but keep getting an answering machine …More

name: Luis Polanco
text: I walk in to order a large deep dish pizza and some Hungry Howie's garlic bread. It took approximately 10 minutes to be ready to go. Super fast service, excellent staff and they were really accommodating with a walk in order, taking into …More

name: Н С
text: Not a fan of pizza in general, but the subs and the salads are delicious! I've only done takeout, and it's always been a great experience so far.  Pretty sure I will come for more!

name: AJ Quintel
text: We order online when we arrived they made the wrong salad so we waited for another to be made only to get honey mustard instead of dressing. Each time I call to get a refund I get the run around and get told to call back later.

name: Missie and Sagan Rill
text: Dude your pizza used to be good...ick. The dough is sweet, I spent $25 on one pizza and a few wings, and you forgot my blue cheese. #marcosforlife

name: D Mcdonald
text: Ordered online with delivery saying it would take an hour. Went to track my order an hour later and it was in the “ordered” phase. Went to give the location a call and was told my order wasn’t in their system at all. But my card was charged …More

name: Dawn Kramer
text: So we just ordered our food. And the sub was not what I wanted. If I wanted a calzone, I would've ordered it. I ordered a turkey club sub with green peppers and onions added to it. Then in the instructions I put 1/2 side bacon and ham …More

name: David Pillsbury
text: Can I give this less stars. Ordered a pizza on December it was raw. My next order was supposed to be free. Flash to the next order today. Not free. And the pizza was raw again. And they didn't bother to cut the bread. I'm done with this place.

name: Gryphondor Streeter
text: our normal store closed an hour earlier so we called this on and would not deliver to us. This store is only .3mi farther................. nice service you guys have.

name: Zach Hallam
text: Made our online order i incorrectly didnt bring the salad at all and took over an hour to redeliver the rest of our meal

name: Scott Mallery
text: Love that Cajun crust

name: Konrad Lepecki
text: Good pizza and bread.  This particular day they had only 1 driver so the wait for delivery was about an hour.  I picked it up in 20 minutes after ordering.

name: Amy Auletto
text: I've ordered delivery from here twice. I live less than 2 miles from the store and my order took nearly an hour both times. According to the website, my pizza was "on the road" for about a half hour both times. I recommend carryout only from here.

name: Jasmine Miller
text: Manger working on Wednesday night April 11th needs to lose his job I call to check on my order he said he called me 3 times which he didn’t ! To tell me they weren’t delivering to me ! I asked him why he made up some sorry ass excuse I said …More

name: D Mcc
text: I am just so surprised someone that rude could possibly be considered for a management position. We had ordered 2 small pizzas online with a 60 minute delivery wait. After an hour and a half, we finally called to see what was going on. …More

name: Matt Swanson
text: I've never had any issues with the service whether picking up a pizza or delivery.  The food has always been good.  Had bad experiences with Domino's and Pizza Hut thus I am not ordering from them anymore.  Would recommend Hungry Howie's over the other pizza chains in the area.

name: Michael
text: All the feta was burnt entirely black and they didn’t put the flavor on my crust like I ordered.

name: Rage 0wnz
text: Awesome pizza

name: Nancy Lansing
text: Just ordered two days in advance for 9 pizza's to be delivered at noon for a business meeting.  Always have great customer service, delivery and food products.  Thanks HH.

name: Marshon McFadden
text: Always good to eat @ hungry Howies

name: Austin Cole
text: Was a hour late and was put on hold was told the issue was they were super busy and didn’t have enough people working not my issue

name: Will Clark
text: We had three pizzas and two subs, they were great!

name: Kayla Jackson
text: Came a few minutes early, delivery driver was really nice, and the food was great. 5*****

name: Jessica Bennett
text:
Pizza was made poorly. Still gooy, way to much garlic on my crust and way to grease. Never order on a friday night.
Ordering here you spend twice as much and wait twice as ling.

name: Lexi Kelly
text: Extremely slow service. I stood in there for 10 minutes before someone even came to help.

name: Jerry Carson
text: Good pizza

name: Gage Mosher
text: Apparently their phone line hangs up randomly and they expect the customer to call back.

name: Emily N.
text: Cheap but fast pizza.

name: Christopher Neve
text: Garlic herb crust!

name: Tony Parish
text: Say they will deliver then call you an hour later and say they can’t ruined my night so bad

name: Liek Feel
text: manager lied about my order being in after closing hours and tried to keep my money

name: Ahmed Alismail
text: Worst service!!

name: Ali Ersan
text: Great customer service from the manager

name: Delaney Mcnutt
text: delivery took an hour longer than they said, rude customer service

name: Sarah Grossbauer
text: Quick, ready on-time.

name: Patricia Perez
text: I order two to four times a month

name: Kayla Renae Alexander
text: Great workers

name: Wes Smith
text: Employees are useless and do not respect the customer. Hungry Howies could save money and buy cones as employees.

name: jacob k
text: Girl was rude as hell on the phone
